summary: Completed testing of Bergeries Disciples and Pain du Jour Admin features. All backend APIs working (12/12 tests passed). Frontend UI verified for both features.

minor.issue: Route was being caught by /api/pain-du-jour/{date} due to route order - FIXED by moving programmations route before {date} route

seed_data_creation: Test bergeries created: TEST_Nouvelle Bergerie Test, TEST_Bergerie Count Test. Test programmation saved for week 2025-W52.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both features fully tested. Bergeries Disciples shows 47 groups (41 static + 6 manually created). Pain du Jour Admin has 5 tabs with Semaine tab showing 5 days (Lundi-Vendredi). Route fix applied to server.py for /api/pain-du-jour/programmations endpoint.

pages_tested: /bergeries-disciples - List of 47 bergeries with city filter
features_verified: Bergeries page shows 47 groupes (41 static + 6 manually created)
Create bergerie dialog has fields: Nom, Responsable, Ville
Pain du Jour Admin login works with superadmin/superadmin123
5 tabs visible: Contenu, Semaine, Versets, Quiz, Stats
Each day has 3 sections: Enseignement, Temps de prière, Versets

fixes_applied.fix: Moved /api/pain-du-jour/programmations route before the {date} route to ensure proper matching
